Recognize elements of Four Organization Cultures.

objectives_summary: Create Employee Journey Map using the principles of Design Thinking

items.title: Recruitment for startups: How to avoid common pitfalls
items.headline: Recruitment strategies for startups:  Avoiding common pitfalls, saving money and hiring the best person for the job.
objectives_summary: Really understand who they want to hire by examining why they are hiring
Get to grips with different employment status which will help them avoid expensive tribunals claims
Understand the true cost of recruiting new staff - it's not just about wages!

items.title: [2020] How To Become a Corporate HR Recruiter

visible_instructors.title: J. Swaby

How to ACE your recruiting interview

items.title: Hiring Great People: Recruiting & Talent Acquisition
items.headline: Hire and keep great people for any business. Learn recruiting tactics, talent acquisition strategies, interview skills.
objectives_summary: What people really want from a job (Hint: It’s not always the highest pay and benefits)
How to quickly sort through online responses to find those diamonds in the rough
How to position your job opening as “exactly what I’m looking for” for that right person

items.title: Organizational Behavior And People Management
items.headline: Great organizational behavior study, leading and managing people, team management & positive corporate culture building
objectives_summary: Understanding of the people side of organizations for profit or non profit
Understand what are the internal and external factors which impact human behavior
How is typical human personality is developed?

items.title: Get the resume that worked for all#1firms+resume/CV template
items.headline: We build the resume (CV) that got offers from Facebook-Google-Amazon-UN-NATO-Goldman-BCG-Oxford-LBS  + resume template
objectives_summary: Download our resume template and build your resume while you watch.
Hear some of our most advanced insights about resume and CV writing.
You will have your version of the CV that secured offers from Google, Facebook, Goldman Sachs, Amazon, London Business School, LSE, Citi Group, etc.

items.title: The HR professional’s guide to cybersecurity

objectives_summary: Organise interviews.
